Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to failure to complete a program for time allowances due to circumstances beyond an individual's control
Summary: Relates to failure to complete a program for time allowances due to circumstances beyond an individual's control.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to failure to complete a program for time allowances due to circumstances beyond an individual's control
